definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Salad Prawns, Barbecued Pork, Scrappy Egg with Fish Maw, Jelly Fish, Rice Rolls.
sentences.chinese: 沙律虾，烧鸭，鱼鳔桂花蛋，海蜇，米卷。

sentences.english: Please don't talk me into eating jellyfish .
sentences.chinese: 妳可别说服我去吃海蜇皮。

sentences.english: Tender, crisp jellyfish, fresh salty and delicious.
In most jellyfish, these stinging cells are so small that they can't penetrate human skin.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数海蜇中，这些蛰刺细胞非常小，以至于无法。

sentences.english: Sink the Jelly Fish in water for one day and night, then cut into julienne.
sentences.chinese: 将海蜇浸泡在清水中一天一夜，然后捞出切成细丝。

sentences.english: I mean it seems to me they jolly well should be.
sentences.chinese: 我说看起来海蜇应该是。

sentences.english: Please don't talk me into eating jellyfish.
sentences.chinese: 你可别说服我去吃海蜇皮。

sentences.english: This picture shows that the fishermen are conveying jellyfish in Lushun Salt Pan.
sentences.chinese: 图为渔民们正在抬运捕获的海蜇。

sentences.english: This invention deals with a manufacturing method for man-made jellyfish.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及人造海蜇的生产方法。

sentences.english: Jellyfish reproduction involves several different stages.
sentences.chinese: 海蜇的繁殖包括几个不同的阶段。

definition: Tellina iridescens (a bivalve mollusk)/any similar small clam
flavored roasted seaweed/generic term for edible seaweed/Japanese: nori
asparagus/(Tw) young shoots of the chayote vine 佛手瓜[fo2 shou3 gua1]
